00025 #pragma once
00026 
00027 #include <l4/sys/task.h>
00028 #include <l4/sys/capability>
00029 
00030 namespace L4 {
00031 
00041 class Task : public Kobject_t<Task, Kobject, L4_PROTO_TASK>
00042 {
00043   L4_KOBJECT(Task)
00044 
00045 public:
00050   l4_msgtag_t map(Cap<Task> const &src_task,
00051                   l4_fpage_t const &snd_fpage, l4_addr_t snd_base,
00052                   l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00053   { return l4_task_map_u(cap(), src_task.cap(), snd_fpage, snd_base, utcb); }
00054 
00059   l4_msgtag_t unmap(l4_fpage_t const &fpage,
00060                     l4_umword_t map_mask,
00061                     l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00062   { return l4_task_unmap_u(cap(), fpage, map_mask, utcb); }
00063 
00068   l4_msgtag_t unmap_batch(l4_fpage_t const *fpages,
00069                           unsigned num_fpages,
00070                           l4_umword_t map_mask,
00071                           l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00072   { return l4_task_unmap_batch_u(cap(), fpages, num_fpages, map_mask, utcb); }
00073 
00078   l4_msgtag_t cap_valid(Cap<void> const &cap,
00079                         l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00080   { return l4_task_cap_valid_u(this->cap(), cap.cap(), utcb); }
00081 
00086   l4_msgtag_t cap_has_child(Cap<void> const &cap,
00087                             l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00088   { return l4_task_cap_has_child_u(this->cap(), cap.cap(), utcb); }
00089 
00094   l4_msgtag_t cap_equal(Cap<void> const &cap_a,
00095                         Cap<void> const &cap_b,
00096                         l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00097   { return l4_task_cap_equal_u(cap(), cap_a.cap(), cap_b.cap(), utcb); }
00098 
00103   l4_msgtag_t add_ku_mem(l4_fpage_t const &fpage,
00104                          l4_utcb_t *utcb = l4_utcb()) throw()
00105   { return l4_task_add_ku_mem_u(cap(), fpage, utcb); }
00106 
00107 };
00108 }
